item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "A short story is a different thing all together - a short story is like a kiss in the dark from a stranger." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fiction is the truth inside the lie." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "It is the tale, not he who tells it." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I recognize terror as the finest emotion and so I will try to terrorize the reader. But if I find that I cannot terrify, I will try to horrify, and if I find that I cannot horrify, I'll go for the gross-out. I'm not proud. " -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you want to be a writer, you must do two things above all others: read a lot and write a lot." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "This is <i>nine! Nine! </i>This is <i>nine! Nine! </i>This is <i>ten! Ten! </i>We have killed your friends! Every friend is now dead! This is <i>six! Six!</i>"<br><i>[...]</i><br>"<i>Eighteen! </i>This is now <i>eighteen! </i>Take cover when the siren sounds! This is <i>four! Four!</i>"<br><i>[...]</i><br>"<i>Five! </i>This is <i>five! </i>Ignore the siren! Even if you leave this room, you can never leave this room! <i>Eight! </i>This is <i>eight!</i>"<br><i>[...]</i><br>"Six!' the phone screamed. '<i>Six, </i>this is <i>six, </i>this is <i>goddam fucking SIX!</i>" -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "you must not come lightly to the blank page." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bill add a quote by David Bowie
item.description: "Some make you sing and some make you scream. One makes you wish that you'd never been seen. But there's a shop on the corner that's selling papier mache, making bullet-proof faces, Charlie Manson, Cassius Clay. If you want it, boys, get it here, thing." -- David Bowie

item.title: Bill add a quote by David Bowie
item.description: "If it works, it's out of date." -- David Bowie

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Here's my theory about meetings and life: the three things you can't fake are erections, competence and creativity." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "You're right, a spleen is a strange thing-we technically don't need one, but maybe spleens are kept in our bodies in case we mutate or evolve, and if we grow wings or tentacles we need to have the spleen in place in order for them to work." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "All families are psychotic. Everybody has basically the same family - it's just reconfigured slightly different from one to the next." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "...blame is just a lazy person's way of making sense of chaos. " -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "I am aware that there is a world out there that functions without regard to me. There are wars and budgets and bombings and vast dimensions of wealth and greed and ambition and corruption. And yet I don't feel a part of that world, and I wouldn't know how to join if I tried." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Adventure without risk is Disneyland." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Destiny is what we work toward. The future doesn't exist yet. Fate is for losers!" -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "I realized that once people are broken in certain ways they can't ever be fixed, and this is something nobody ever tells you when you are young and it never fails to surprise you as you grow older as you see the people in your life break one by one." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "In periods of rapid personal change, we pass through life as though we are spellcast. We speak in sentences that end before finishing. We sleep heavily because we need to ask so many questions as we dream alone. We bump into others and feel bashful at recognizing souls so similar to ourselves." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "TV and the Internet are good because they keep stupid people from spending too much time out in public." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "just then a bee bumbled above us and stole our attention the way flying things can" -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Compromise is said to be the way of the world and yet I find myself feeling sick trying to accept what it has done to me." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Bill add a quote by Keith Richards
item.description: "If you're going to kick authority in the teeth, you might as well use two feet." -- Keith Richards

item.title: Bill add a quote by Keith Richards
item.description: "It's really good to be here and as I always say, it's really good to be anywhere!" -- Keith Richards

item.title: Bill add a quote by Keith Richards
item.description: "I don't regret nuthin... " -- Keith Richards

item.title: Bill add a quote by Kate Bush
item.description: "I think quotes are very dangerous things." -- Kate Bush
